entities.description: The relationship between the victim and the offender.
The victim was a friend of the offender.
The victim was a neighbor of the offender.
The victim was a babysittee (the baby) of the offender.
The victim was a boyfriend or girlfriend of the offender.
The victim was the child of the offender's boyfriend or girlfriend.
The victim was an ex-spouse of the offender.
The victim was an employee of the offender.
The victim was an employer of the offender.
The victim was a stranger to the offender.
The victim was a spouse of the offender.
The victim was a common-law spouse of the offender.
The victim was a parent of the offender.
The victim was a sibling of the offender.
The victim was a child of the offender.
The victim was a grandparent of the offender.
The victim was a grandchild of the offender.
The victim was an in-law of the offender.
The victim was a stepparent of the offender.
The victim was a stepchild of the offender.
The victim was a stepsibling of the offender.
The victim was another family member of the offender.
The victim was also the offender.
Data that is missing from the survey.

relationships.description: Relates the relationship type to its unweighted frequency count.
Relates the relationship type to its percentage distribution in the dataset.
Specifies the type of relationship the victim had with the offender.
